title: Carruthers, Landsbottom and Og

properties.name: description
properties.value: Carruthers, Landsbottom and Og is a law firm that has been referred to in a number of issues of Postbag from the Hedge. The firm appears to represent a number of clients, including Pirate Smith, Klarense, and the Consortium of Extra-Planar Merchandise Transferral Specialists responsible for selling many dragon weapons. The firm is referenced in issues 13,[1] 17,[2] and 20.[3] It has not been featured in-game, although there is already an NPC named Og; whether he is the Og of the law firm is not known. The firm's legal consultant in the weapons division is C. P. L-F. Carruthers, Esq (LLB).

content:
This article contains information only featured in Postbag from the Hedge.
Postbags released during the RuneScape 2 era (2005-07) are generally not considered canon, unless otherwise mentioned. Postbags released during the Old School era (since 2021) are generally considered canon.

Carruthers, Landsbottom and Og is a law firm that has been referred to in a number of issues of Postbag from the Hedge. The firm appears to represent a number of clients, including Pirate Smith, Klarense, and the Consortium of Extra-Planar Merchandise Transferral Specialists responsible for selling many dragon weapons. The firm is referenced in issues 13,[1] 17,[2] and 20.[3] It has not been featured in-game, although there is already an NPC named Og; whether he is the Og of the law firm is not known. The firm's legal consultant in the weapons division is C. P. L-F. Carruthers, Esq (LLB).

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Postbag 13 - "Transcript:The Evil Chicken defends his reputation.", Letter 2, by Carruthers, Landsbottom and Og. RuneScape Postbags from the Hedge.
  2. ^ Jagex. Postbag 17 - "Transcript:Happy Birthday, Mr Elemental.", Letter 8, by Klarense. RuneScape Postbags from the Hedge.
  3. ^ Jagex. Postbag 20 - "Transcript:Tales from earlier ages", Letter 2, by Pirate Smith. RuneScape Postbags from the Hedge.
